turns.content: Imagination lays the groundwork for reality to follow: I believe this deeply however for some reason it is hard for me to connect with and live from this

Imagination is a powerful tool that can help us create our reality. It allows us to visualize what we want and to come up with creative solutions to problems. However, it can be difficult to connect with our imagination and to use it to its full potential. This is because our minds are often preoccupied with the demands of daily life, and it can be challenging to quiet our thoughts and tap into our imagination. One way to overcome this challenge is to make time for activities that encourage imaginative thinking, such as daydreaming, brainstorming, or creative writing. By regularly engaging in these activities, we can train our minds to be more imaginative and open to new ideas. Additionally, it can be helpful to surround ourselves with people who support and encourage our imagination, as this can help us feel more confident in using it to shape our reality.
